reference.title: Path to GC Roots
reference.shortdesc: Find out who is keeping alive a set of objects.

section.title: Motivation
section.p: Having found an expensive object it is then important to find all the reasons it is kept alive.

strow.stentry: One object for which the paths to GC roots should be found.
Fields of certain classes which should be ignored when finding paths. For example this allows paths through Weak or Soft Reference referents to be ignored.
The number of different paths to be displayed.
